articles.author: Abid Hussain
articles.title: Pakistan’s ex-PM Imran Khan shot in leg at protest march - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Party official confirms former prime minister has been shot at a rally but is not in danger.
articles.content:
Islamabad, Pakistan Imran Khan, the former prime minister of Pakistan, has sustained a bullet injury in his leg after a gunman opened fire at a rally in Wazirabad.
Azhar Mashwani, an official with K… [+1271 chars]
